summary: The federal government needs to move with greater urgency to improve the nation's cybersecurity as the country faces grave and rapidly evolving threats. This report reiterates that the government needs to take 10 critical actions to address 4 major challenges we identified in 2018, including securing federal systems and protecting critical infrastructure. Since then, the government has made some improvements, but weaknesses remain—as seen in...
title: High-Risk Series: Federal Government Needs to Urgently Pursue Critical Actions to Address Major Cybersecurity Challenges
